revised_title: Analysis of Arseniates of Copper and Iron: A Continuation of Count de Bournon's Treatise on Ores
tldr: This paper presents an analytical investigation of the arseniates of copper and iron, confirming the classification established by Count de Bournon. The author also analyzes a red octaedral copper ore from Cornwall and suggests that it may be a superior source of copper due to its purity and ease of extraction.
